title: Late Night Lit: Maggie Shipstead | Dana Schwartz
description:
On this month's episode of our literary podcast Late Night Lit, Sarah Jenks-Daly speaks with two great novelists. She talks to Maggie Shipstead, author of Great Circle, and Dana Schwartz, whose new book Anatomy: A Love Story is available now. Schwartz also hosts the podcast Noble Blood.

Plus, writer Marc Bernardin shares a book recommendation.
